title: 公众号启动感悟
titleEn: Reflections on Launching My Official Account
excerpt: 今天,小Lin思考公众号正式启动。这是一个勇敢的开始,我决定用文字记录思考,用写作输出所思所想。思考是成长的阶梯,表达是认知的升级。
excerptEn: Today, the LittleLin Thinking official account is officially launched. This is a brave start. I decided to record my thoughts with words and express my ideas through writing. Thinking is the ladder of growth, and expression is the upgrade of cognition.
